item.title: Singapore Police Received 631 Cryptocurrency Scam Reports in 2021, Government Says
item.description: Singapore Police Received 631 Cryptocurrency Scam Reports in 2021, Government Says The government of Singapore has revealed the number of crypto scams reported to the police in the past three years.
